title: Is there any counter play against a Vayne ADC and Yorick Supp with the new wall ability?

replies.body:
Is there any counterplay against Vayne? No.

Therefore.... No.

I know Vayne takes a bit of mechanical skill, but honestly I think Vayne is easier to play than most immobile ADC's who just can't kite as effectively as her, even with their own tools. OFF TOPIC SORRY

I hold a pink at all times for when i start a fight with Vayne. Drop it on her ass so when she ults no more disabling my auto. 

Also they are easy to tilt. I have NOT met a vayne player i couldn't tilt. 

Also forcing her farm under tower pisses her off.

Not running near walls on engage works a charm too. 

I seriously hardly have problems with Vayne.. The only problem i have with vayne is when my team have no clue how to counter her, or they try 1v1 one her when she is behind because they think she is weak due to being behind then give her an easy kill as she is one of the BEST 1v1 champions in the game, certainly second only to Quinn as an ADC that can 1v1.

Pink ward + oracle lens = counter vayne ult  and exhaust to reduce 40% attack speed 

As for yorick I have no idea really but play safe since its a cancerous lane.
ganks? i dont play much no more but both champs still seem like immobile sacks of shit. Vayne is always succeptible to getting ruined early game and idk bout yorick
Not as dirty as Anivia support and Vayne.

I mean an anivia means just angle yourself so that your not going to hit the wall (Anivia can't change the orientation of the wall, so they can't really force you into a position to take the wall all that easily)

Yorick's wall is a circle around you that you can't really avoid in terms of a condemn (because your in the middle of it)

Unless it might be the case (i don't know i haven't tested) that if your at the far end of the wall, you may be out of range for the opposite side, for a condemn to stun (if that makes sense)

Anivia's wall is instant, Yorick's wall has a short delay. It's also not that hard to angle and covers a wider region without a hp bar to deplete. Also she has her own stun which doubles her E damage pretty much making it very hard to react if Vayne's condemn lands.

j4 wall outclasses yorick wall in that case because he can put it up the instant vayne uses her e, but yorick has a 1.5 sec activate so you would needa wait.

Yes but for J4 it's an ult, for Yorick it's a normal ability.

So your not forced to wait for a massive ass cooldown, and depending on the positioning, it wouldn't be hard to force people into, your either in this Yorick wall, or in the side of lane wall.

Vayne = most skilled champ.

Jks I am a Vayne main and even I have to admit her recent buffs were unnecessary. She's now way too strong. I am betting its cause a Vayne skin is coming out and they are buffing her so she'll get played in worlds a ton. If I'm right I can't wait for a new skin for her ;D
